themes: Longstanding underachievement in Austin's arts scene
Loss and impact of COVID-19 on arts organizations
Lack of support for children's theatre
Shifting away from arts due to perceived ineffectiveness
key_phrases: thank you for continuing to support the arts at all in Austin
we have not met our potential these past 30 odd years
our theatre company (Pollyanna) folded during COVID
never supported a major professional resident children's theatre
tired of processes that don't seem to end up making a difference
barriers_identified: Lack of sustained support for children's theatre
Funding and administrative processes that feel ineffective
Impact of COVID-19 leading to closure of arts organizations
Disillusionment causing artists to leave the sector
